import React, { useRef } from 'react' import Input from '../component/Input' function Login(props) { const usernameref = useRef() const [username, setUsername] = useState() const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault() console.log('====================================') console.log(username.current.value) console.log('====================================') } return (
setUsername(e.target.current)} >
) } export default Login
